verses.verse: Then the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> to me, "Take<WH3947> for yourself a large<WH1419> tablet<WH1549> and write<WH3789> on it in ordinary<WH582> letters:<WH2747> Swift<WH4116> is the booty,<WH7998> speedy<WH2363> is the prey.<WH957>
"And I will take<WH5749> to Myself faithful<WH539> witnesses<WH5707> for testimony,<WH5749> Uriah<WH223> the priest<WH3548> and Zechariah<WH2148> the son<WH1121> of Jeberechiah.<WH3000>"

So I approached<WH7126> the prophetess,<WH5031> and she conceived<WH2029> and gave<WH3205> birth<WH3205> to a son.<WH1121> Then the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> to me, "Name<WH7121> <WH8034> him Maher-shalal-hash-baz;

for before<WH2962> the boy<WH5288> knows<WH3045> how to cry<WH7121> out 'My father' or 'My mother,<WH1>' the wealth<WH517> of Damascus<WH2428> and the spoil<WH1834> of Samaria<WH7998> will be carried<WH8111> away before<WH5375> the king<WH6440> of Assyria.<WH4428>"
And again<WH3254> the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to me further,<WH5750> saying,<WH559>

"Inasmuch<WH3282> <WH3588> as these<WH2088> people<WH5971> have rejected<WH3988> the gently<WH328> flowing<WH1980> waters<WH4325> of Shiloah,<WH7975> And rejoice<WH4885> in Rezin<WH7526> and the son<WH1121> of Remaliah;<WH7425>

"Now therefore,<WH3651> behold,<WH2009> the Lord<WH136> is about to bring<WH5927> on them the strong<WH6099> and abundant<WH7227> waters<WH4325> of the Euphrates,<WH5104> Even the king<WH4428> of Assyria<WH804> and all<WH3605> his glory;<WH9202> And it will rise<WH5927> up over<WH5921> all<WH3605> its channels<WH650> and go<WH1980> over<WH5921> all<WH3605> its banks.<WH1415>

"Then it will sweep<WH2498> on into Judah,<WH3063> it will overflow<WH7857> and pass<WH5674> through,<WH5674> It will reach<WH5060> even<WH5704> to the neck;<WH6677> And the spread<WH4298> of its wings<WH3671> will fill<WH4393> the breadth<WH7341> of your land,<WH776> O Immanuel.<WH6005>

"Be broken,<WH9570> O peoples,<WH5971> and be shattered;<WH2865> And give<WH238> ear,<WH238> all<WH3605> remote<WH4801> places<WH4801> of the earth.<WH776> Gird<WH247> yourselves, yet be shattered;<WH2865> Gird<WH247> yourselves, yet be shattered.<WH2865>
"Devise<WH5779> a plan<WH6098> but it will be thwarted;<WH6565> State<WH1696> a proposal,<WH1697> but it will not stand,<WH6965> For God<WH410> is with us."
For thus<WH3541> the Lord<WH3068> spoke<WH559> to me with mighty<WH2393> power<WH3027> and instructed<WH3256> me not to walk<WH1980> in the way<WH1870> of this<WH2088> people,<WH5971> saying,<WH559>

"You are not to say,<WH559> '[It is] a conspiracy!<WH7195>' In regard to all<WH3605> that this<WH2088> people<WH5971> call<WH559> a conspiracy,<WH7195> And you are not to fear<WH3372> what<WH4172> they fear<WH4172> or be in dread<WH6206> of [it.]
"It is the Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> whom you should regard<WH6942> as holy.<WH6942> And He shall be your fear,<WH4172> And He shall be your dread.<WH6206>

"Then He shall become<WH1961> a sanctuary;<WH4720> But to both<WH8147> the houses<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> a stone<WH68> to strike<WH5063> and a rock<WH6697> to stumble<WH4383> over, [And] a snare<WH6341> and a trap<WH4170> for the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem.<WH3389>
"And many<WH7227> will stumble<WH3782> over them, Then they will fall<WH5307> and be broken;<WH7665> They will even be snared<WH3369> and caught.<WH3920>"
Bind<WH9503> up the testimony,<WH8584> seal<WH2856> the law<WH8451> among my disciples.<WH3928>
And I will wait<WH2442> for the Lord<WH3068> who is hiding<WH5641> His face<WH6440> from the house<WH1004> of Jacob;<WH3290> I will even look<WH6960> eagerly<WH6960> for Him.

Behold,<WH2009> I and the children<WH3206> whom<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> has given<WH5414> me are for signs<WH226> and wonders<WH4159> in Israel<WH3478> from the Lord<WH3068> of hosts,<WH6635> who dwells<WH7931> on Mount<WH2022> Zion.<WH6726>

And when<WH3588> they say<WH559> to you, "Consult<WH1875> the mediums<WH178> and the spiritists<WH3049> who whisper<WH6850> and mutter,<WH1897>" should not a people<WH5971> consult<WH1875> their God<WH430>? [Should they] [consult] the dead<WH4191> on behalf<WH1157> of the living<WH2416>?
To the law<WH8451> and to the testimony!<WH8584> If<WH518> they do not speak<WH559> according to this<WH2088> word,<WH1697> it is because<WH834> they have<WH369> no<WH369> dawn.<WH7837>
